snippet: Even with the N.F.L.’s new protocol, illegal blows to the head or neck are still occurring at a rate of nearly one a game.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Associated Press review of penalties through the first 11 weeks of the season shows that even with the NFL’s new protocol, illegal blows to the head or neck are still occurring at a rate of nearly one a game; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Even with the N.F.L.’s new protocol, illegal blows to the head or neck are still occurring at a rate of nearly one a game.

headline.main: Illegal Hits Are Still Seen As a Problem
headline.print_headline: Illegal Hits Are Still Seen As a Problem
